languages.text: "Я просто избавилась от лишнего. Я прятала свой страх за байками, шуточками и подхалимством. Теперь страх ушел, а значит, и прятать его незачем. Я больше не дам вам поводов называть меня обузой или риском, Лорд-капитан. Я ваш инструмент, {name}, повелевайте". {n}Идира учтиво кланяется и выжидающе смотрит на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я просто избавилась от лишнего. Я прятала свой страх за байками, шуточками и подхалимством. Теперь страх ушел, а значит, и прятать его незачем. Я больше не дам вам поводов называть меня обузой или риском, Лорд-капитан. Я ваш инструмент, {name}, повелевайте". {n}Идира учтиво кланяется и выжидающе смотрит на вас.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "This is just me, stripped of all the stuff that doesn't matter. I used to hide my fear behind stories, jokes, and sucking up to my superiors. Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool, {name} — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я просто избавилась от лишнего. Я прятала свой страх за байками, шуточками и подхалимством. Теперь страх ушел, а значит, и прятать его незачем. Я больше не дам вам поводов называть меня обузой или риском, Лорд-капитан. Я ваш инструмент, {name}, повелевайте". {n}Идира учтиво кланяется и выжидающе смотрит на вас.{/n}

Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool, {name} — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我已经被剥夺了所有不重要的东西，这就是我现在的样子。我曾把我的恐惧隐藏在故事、笑话与马屁之中，但现在，我的恐惧已经消失了，我也不需要再隐藏什么了。你不会再有任何理由觉得我是个负担或是累赘，舰长大人。我就是你的工具，{name}，按照你的意愿来使用我吧。”{n}伊迪拉鞠了一躬，以期待的目光看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is just me, stripped of all the stuff that doesn't matter. I used to hide my fear behind stories, jokes, and sucking up to my superiors. Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool, {name} — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我已经被剥夺了所有不重要的东西，这就是我现在的样子。我曾把我的恐惧隐藏在故事、笑话与马屁之中，但现在，我的恐惧已经消失了，我也不需要再隐藏什么了。你不会再有任何理由觉得我是个负担或是累赘，舰长大人。我就是你的工具，{name}，按照你的意愿来使用我吧。”{n}伊迪拉鞠了一躬，以期待的目光看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "This is just me, stripped of all the stuff that doesn't matter. I used to hide my fear behind stories, jokes, and sucking up to my superiors. Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool,  — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}

languages.text: «Esta soy yo, sin todas las cosas irrelevantes. Antes ocultaba mi miedo detrás de historias, bromas y hacerles la pelota a mis superiores. Ahora que ya no tengo miedo, no necesito esconder nada. No le daré más motivos para considerarme una carga o una molestia, Lord Capitán. Soy su herramienta, {name}. Úseme a placer». {n}Idira te hace una reverencia y te mira, expectante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is just me, stripped of all the stuff that doesn't matter. I used to hide my fear behind stories, jokes, and sucking up to my superiors. Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool, {name} — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esta soy yo, sin todas las cosas irrelevantes. Antes ocultaba mi miedo detrás de historias, bromas y hacerles la pelota a mis superiores. Ahora que ya no tengo miedo, no necesito esconder nada. No le daré más motivos para considerarme una carga o una molestia, Lord Capitán. Soy su herramienta, {name}. Úseme a placer». {n}Idira te hace una reverencia y te mira, expectante.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「これは、どうでもいいものをすべて取り除いただけのもの。以前は会話や冗談、上位者に媚びへつらうことでで恐怖心を隠していたわ。今は恐怖がなくなったから、もう何も隠す必要はないの。これ以上、あたいを重荷や足手まといと呼ばせる理由は与えないわ、ロード・キャプテン。あたいはあなたの道具よ、{name}様。どうぞお好きなように使ってちょうだい」{n}イディラはお辞儀をし、期待するようにあなたを見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is just me, stripped of all the stuff that doesn't matter. I used to hide my fear behind stories, jokes, and sucking up to my superiors. Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool, {name} — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これは、どうでもいいものをすべて取り除いただけのもの。以前は会話や冗談、上位者に媚びへつらうことでで恐怖心を隠していたわ。今は恐怖がなくなったから、もう何も隠す必要はないの。これ以上、あたいを重荷や足手まといと呼ばせる理由は与えないわ、ロード・キャプテン。あたいはあなたの道具よ、{name}様。どうぞお好きなように使ってちょうだい」{n}イディラはお辞儀をし、期待するようにあなたを見る。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Das bin ich, einfach nur ich, von all den unwichtigen Dingen befreit. Früher habe ich mich hinter Geschichten und Witzen und Schmeicheleien gegenüber meinen Vorgesetzten versteckt. Nun ist meine Furcht verflogen, ich muss mich also nicht mehr verstecken. Ich werde Euch keinen weiteren Grund geben, mich als Last oder Risiko anzusehen, Lord Captain. Ich bin Euer Werkzeug, {name} — nutzt mich nach Belieben." {n}Idira verneigt sich und blickt dich erwartungsvoll an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is just me, stripped of all the stuff that doesn't matter. I used to hide my fear behind stories, jokes, and sucking up to my superiors. Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool, {name} — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das bin ich, einfach nur ich, von all den unwichtigen Dingen befreit. Früher habe ich mich hinter Geschichten und Witzen und Schmeicheleien gegenüber meinen Vorgesetzten versteckt. Nun ist meine Furcht verflogen, ich muss mich also nicht mehr verstecken. Ich werde Euch keinen weiteren Grund geben, mich als Last oder Risiko anzusehen, Lord Captain. Ich bin Euer Werkzeug, {name} — nutzt mich nach Belieben." {n}Idira verneigt sich und blickt dich erwartungsvoll an.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis comme ça, une fois qu'on enlève tout ce qui n'a pas d'importance. Avant, je cachais ma peur en racontant des histoires, en plaisantant et en léchant les bottes de mes supérieurs. Mais maintenant que je n'ai plus peur, je n'ai plus rien à cacher. Je ne veux plus être un fardeau ou un risque pour vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Non, je suis un outil. Alors utilisez-moi comme bon vous semble, {name}, » {n}conclut Idira avec une révérence tout en vous lançant un regard rempli d'espoir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is just me, stripped of all the stuff that doesn't matter. I used to hide my fear behind stories, jokes, and sucking up to my superiors. Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool, {name} — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis comme ça, une fois qu'on enlève tout ce qui n'a pas d'importance. Avant, je cachais ma peur en racontant des histoires, en plaisantant et en léchant les bottes de mes supérieurs. Mais maintenant que je n'ai plus peur, je n'ai plus rien à cacher. Je ne veux plus être un fardeau ou un risque pour vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Non, je suis un outil. Alors utilisez-moi comme bon vous semble, {name}, » {n}conclut Idira avec une révérence tout en vous lançant un regard rempli d'espoir.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Karşında sadece ben varım. Mühim olmayan her şeyden arınmış hâlim bu. Eskiden korkularımı hikâyelerimin, esprilerimin ve dalkavukluklarımın ardına saklardım. Ancak artık korkmuyorum. Bundandır ki saklayacak bir şeyim kalmadı. Lord Kaptan, artık beni yük ya da sorumluluk olarak görmen için bir neden yok. Emrindeyim {name}. Kabiliyetlerimden dilediğin gibi faydalanabilirsin." {n}İdira, önünde eğilerek beklentiyle sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is just me, stripped of all the stuff that doesn't matter. I used to hide my fear behind stories, jokes, and sucking up to my superiors. Now my fear's gone, so I don't need to hide anything anymore. I won't give you any more reasons to call me a burden or a liability, Lord Captain. I am your tool, {name} — use me as you will." {n}Idira bows and looks at you expectantly.{/n}
